about_the_game:
ABOUT THE CONTENTS

You can access the 'Big-titted Office Bride' story from 'Obedient Women'.

Big-titted Office Bride

HEROINE:
Kurara Hasumi
A young office lady studies about foreplay and sex positions after losing her virginity on her wedding night.

SYNOPSIS (Big-titted Office Bride)


She's the humble new lady with big tits in the office.
She's happy because she just got married to her sweetheart, Toya Hasumi, and they had their first special night together several days ago.
She's satisfied with the sex she has with her husband and doesn't feel the need to cheat on him at all.
She likes to spend time with him, even at the office, and sometimes they kiss in private, like lovebirds.
She's learning about foreplay and sex positions.
Her body is still innocent.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game product contains sexual content and is intended for adults only.
It contains images and descriptions of adult nudity and sexual behavior.
The contents of this game are inappropriate for minors and perhaps not suitable for the workplace.
All characters involved in any sexual situations in this game are intended to be over 18 years of age.
Some non-consensual sexual activity is included.
This is a work of fiction.
